class.name: Seed
class.description: An utility class that provides character type and seed type enumerations for random seed generation. Works in conjunction with RNG systems to define what types of characters should be used when generating random seeds.

constants.constant: Only numbers (0-9). Seed will contain only numeric characters.
Only capital letters (A-Z). Seed will contain only uppercase alphabetic characters.
Only lowercase letters (a-z). Seed will contain only lowercase alphabetic characters.
Both capital and lowercase letters (A-Z, a-z). Seed will contain mixed case alphabetic characters.
Numbers, capital and lowercase letters mixed (0-9, A-Z, a-z). Seed will contain all character types.
